description: Well is forced to participate in the kingdom`s martial arts tournament due to his nobility. However, he quickly gives up hope of winning when he learns that magic is prohibited in the tournament. Meanwhile Er, Iina, and Louise also decide to participate. While Er was taking it lightly at first, certain developments cause him to promise that he`ll win it.

titles.title: Mahou Kinshitte, Sore wa Nai Deshou!
No Magic? Are You Kidding Me?!
Pas de magie ? Dites-moi que je rêve !
魔法禁止って, それはないでしょう!
